column4: hey people I just did a kernal update on my system and now I have Debian GNU/Linux on my entrys is this ok, can I edit them back to Ubuntu labled?
I'm not sure on how to delete old kernels, but as I can tell, your fine, if you can boot up and everything runs fine, it may have just put the wrong name perhaps.
of course, that also, apt-get remove <kernel>
